name: AllCare Technologies Philippines, Inc.
description: Developer of a digital membership platform designed to offer benefits to freelancers and self-employed individuals. The company's platform offers benefits such as health, training, and transportation, enabling freelancers and self-employed individuals to get access to affordable company benefits and other perks which are enjoyed by traditional employees.
